Hypertensive Disorders of Pregnancy (Pre.details: Management of eclampsia at 32-37 weeks, management of seizures (Magnesium Sulphate), maternal/fetal risks, differential diagnosis of convulsions in pregnancy.

Anaemia in Pregnancy.details: Iron deficiency anaemia, G3P2/G4P2 case scenarios with breathlessness at 32 weeks, investigations (Hb, peripheral smear, serum ferritin), management (parenteral iron vs blood transfusion), plan of management at term.

Antepartum Haemorrhage (APH).details: Placenta Previa vs Abruptio Placentae, management of bleeding at 32-34 weeks, types/diagnosis/management of low-lying placenta.

Postpartum Haemorrhage (PPH).details: Atonic vs Traumatic, management steps (resuscitation, medical management, surgical interventions), prevention using AMTSL.

Multiple Pregnancy (Twins).details: Clinical features, maternal/fetal complications, conduct of delivery, risks of monochorionic twins (TTTS).

Malpresentations (Breech).details: Causes of breech, management of assisted breech delivery at 36-38 weeks, complications in labour.

Labour Complications & Management (LSCS.details: Management of previous LSCS (TOLAC/VBAC), definitions and classification of CS, measures to reduce CS rates.

Heart Disease in Pregnancy.details: Rheumatic Heart Disease (Mitral Stenosis), NYHA classification, management during labour and principles of cardiac failure management.

Diabetes in Pregnancy (GDM).details: Screening (GTT/DIPSI), criteria for diagnosis, complications in newborn, management of labor on insulin therapy.

Fibroid Uterus / AUB.details: FIGO classification of AUB (PALM-COEIN), medical and surgical management (myomectomy vs hysterectomy), complications of fibroids, evaluation of 40-46 year old with enlarged uterus.

Carcinoma Cervix.details: Latest FIGO (2018) staging, screening (Pap/HPV), management of stage IB1 in 50-56 year olds, HPV vaccination role.

Uterovaginal Prolapse.details: Etiology and supports of uterus, classification (POPQ vs Shawâ€™s), surgical management (Fothergill's, VH/PFR), management of decubitus ulcer.

Infertility.details: Inability to conceive after 3-5 years, history and evaluation of couple, tubal patency tests, semen analysis (WHO criteria), evaluation of male subfertile partner.

Ovarian Tumours.details: Classify ovarian tumours, symptoms and management of dermoid cysts, diagnosis of malignant ovarian tumour, FIGO staging.

Contraception.details: Mechanism of action, side effects, and contraindications of Intrauterine Devices (IUCD) and Hormonal Contraceptives (OCPs).

Carcinoma Endometrium & PMB.details: Causes of postmenopausal bleeding, risk factors for endometrial cancer, management of FIGO stage I.

Physiology of Menstruation.details: Menstrual cycle in detail, hormonal regulation of follicular and luteal phases, definition of normal menstruation.

Fetal Assessment & Monitoring.details: Biophysical profile (BPP), Non-stress test (NST), Partogram, First trimester screening (NT scan), APGAR score.

Operative Obstetrics.details: Forceps (prerequisites/types/complications), Vacuum (Ventouse) delivery, Episiotomy (types/complications), External Cephalic Version (ECV) contraindications.

Abortion & Ectopic Pregnancy.details: Missed abortion, Incomplete abortion, Medical vs Surgical management of ectopic, Recurrent pregnancy loss.

Maternal Health & Social Obstetrics.details: Define maternal mortality, causes (direct/indirect), Respectful Maternity Care (RMC) components, MTP Act (rules and regulations), Labour Care Guide.

Puerperium & Lactation.details: Puerperal pyrexia/sepsis causes, Physiology of lactation, benefits of breast feeding, Neonatal jaundice causes.

Pharmacotherapy.details: Magnesium Sulphate (dose/toxicity), Anti-D prophylaxis, Prostaglandins in obstetrics, Parenteral iron therapy, Labour Analgesia.

Malpositions & Complications.details: Deep transverse arrest, Shoulder dystocia management, Cord prolapse, Occipito-posterior position, Cervical incompetence (McDonald/Shirodkar).

Multiple Pregnancy Details.details: Complications of monochorionic twins, Burns Marshall method, management of labor in twins.

Newborn Care.details: Steps of neonatal resuscitation, Causes of neonatal hypoglycaemia, Hemolytic disease of newborn.

Contraception.details: LNG-IUS (Mirena), PPIUCD, non-contraceptive benefits of OCPs, Barrier methods (male condom advantages/problems), Emergency contraception, Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT).

Infections.details: Bacterial Vaginosis (Amsel's criteria), Vulvovaginal Candidiasis (symptoms/treatment), Trichomonas Vaginitis, PID (diagnosis/OPD management), Genital Tuberculosis diagnosis.

Diagnostic & Surgical Procedures.details: Hysteroscopy uses, Laparoscopy indications/complications, Liquid-based cytology (LBC), Colposcopy indications, Tubal patency tests (HSG), Semen analysis (WHO).

Menstrual & Hormonal Disorders.details: PCOS (Rotterdam criteria/management), Primary/Secondary Amenorrhea causes, Dysmenorrhea (classification), Puberty menorrhagia.

Benign Conditions.details: Myomectomy (indications), Adenomyosis, Endometriosis (theories/features), Bartholin cyst, Imperforate hymen features.

Anatomy & Development.details: Supports of uterus (anatomical/physiological), Development of ovary, Mullerian anomalies.

Molar Pregnancy.details: Diagnosis and management of hydatidiform mole, Follow-up of vesicular mole, complete vs partial mole differences.

Miscellaneous.details: Vesico-Vaginal Fistula (VVF) etiology, Stress Urinary Incontinence (SUI), Turner's Syndrome, Ormeloxifene.
